column5: Hi all,  went back to the same spot on eagle lake, only real difference was my buddy paul joined me for the session.  Only thing different done to the day before was since i had a buddy with me we drilled a few more holes out to the deeper water...the ice is good all the way across now...averaging around 8-9".  I got one small sauger on a jiggin' rap in the deep water....then we slowly moved our way back top the shallows for the evening bite, jigging pre-drilled holes along the way, with no takers.  the bite came on from aabout 3-4pm then just turned off like someone had flicked a switch.  The most productive hole the day before yesterday was again the 'honey hole', and not being a gentleman i took that hole for myself....lol.  In fact all the fish except the one sauger and one that got off for Paul...which would have been the biggest fish (always the way) came out of that hole again.  Paul did not get a fish unfortunately ...but he got a walleye supper chez Limey's last night so he cant complain.....lol.   EAGLE LAKE PART II

Funny how that is sometimes. I have been out with a group of 3-4 others...many times...and 80% of the fish come out of that one honey hole. Doesn't matter who is fishing it, or what they are using.  Thx again for the report Simon. My perch spot still isn't good to go yet...so I slept in  ....Next weekend for sure though.
Beauty report Simon Now you done it...... I'm going to hit one of our local lakes this afternoon for some fun Keep them reports coming and thanks for sharing Jacques
Oh come on Simon! I'm running out of "nice" nasty things to say and it's not even the end of December yet.
Great stuff Simon, keep the reports coming..................I think I said this on another board,   :lol:  :lol:  Spiel, you still have a few "words" available, just consult the dictionary!!!!!!!!!!!
Perhaps I should just ask Roger for some input......LOL

Yup Steve, anyone who icefishes has had that before , i'm sure of it.    WOOOOHOOOO....cant wait for the report...good luck!    LOL...Chris.....i know these posts are hurting ya...i almost did not post it for that reason (yeah right)     I'm doing the rounds this year TJ
It's all good Simon, it's all good.  It'll be me laughing one day when you wake up find me camped out in your backyard.
You should put the reel cam on Ebay as you said!  It seems 'reel' sturdy!  That's it, I have given it a name.  Let's share the patent.     Shall I call Dragons Den or should you?  Great job again!
I have heard of this Chez Limey's. Invitation only I think.

I thought that Joey was organising the OFC GTG for here next year?....hehehehe    Sorry Phish...already named and patented a long time ago...no way i'm sharing royalties.....lol    plenty of space for campers/RVs/ and tents on our 9 acre plot....come on up Mopar....just give me a couple of days notice....and of course no charge for OFNers.
Session TWO, eh?  Not too shabby...keep'em comin!    Must be nice to be able to fish for enough walleye that you get bored of 'em by the time trout season opens
Man I really enjoy your fishin' vids Simon, especially the ice fishin' ones!!!  Thanks for taking the time to put them together!!!  ... btw, is that 2 little bells on the end of your fishin' pole?
u are makin me jealous   limey
yew tew tok funnee  nice report
nothing would make me and my son happier. We will be thru Dryden in june on our way to Perrault.  Beer on me?
Sure thing....MPH......would be a blast. Let me know the dates and i'll mark it on my calendar....and bring lots of bug spray!
